title: ngx-pact ng generate service with pact

withPact.description: When true, does create "pact.spec.ts" test files for the new service.

port.description: The port of the pact server, defaults to 1234.

consumer.description: The name of that consumer, defaults to project name

provider.description: The name of the provider, defaults to `some-provider`

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the service?

path.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the service.
